intro.description: Hello, I'm Dionmax. I'm a full-stack developer with 4 years of experience.

about.heading: About
about.description1: I'm Dionmax. I'm a full-stack developer with 4 years of experience developing for private companies. I enjoy creating websites and applications. My focus is PHP and React.
about.description2: After graduating in Computer Science, I decided to pursue my passion for programming. Before graduating I was already working in a company and soon became a full-stack developer.
about.description3: My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect. I love the feeling of finally finding a solution to a problem. My main stack is React, PHP, SQL.
about.description4: I'm also very familiar with TypeScript and Python, as well as C#, Java and C++. I'm always looking to learn new technologies. I'm currently looking for a full-time position as a software developer.
about.description5: When I'm not programming, I like to play video games, watch movies and play with my dog. I also like to learn new things.I'm currently learning about data science so that I can become a professional in the field.

1.title: Coletum
1.description: I worked as a full-stack developer on this project for 2 years. The aim was to collect and sort data for companies.

2.title: OpenTuna
2.description: I worked as a front-end developer on this project. The aim was to organize and map tuna fishing data for the entire Brazilian coast.

3.title: PropesqWeb
3.description: I worked as a full-stack developer on this project. Sorting and generating reports on all the fishing data in Brazil.

1.title: Complete C# course Object-Oriented Programming + Projects
1.description: I learned about object-oriented programming with C#. I learned about classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation, interfaces, delegates, events, exceptions, collections, lambda expressions, LINQ, Entity Framework, and much more.

2.title: Degree in Computer Science
2.description: Graduated after 5 years of study. I got a remote job before finishing my studies. And I've been studying ever since.

3.title: Full-Stack Developer
3.description: I've worked on PHP web projects with Symfony2, projects with Typescript and React, and other functions involving DB with R and SQL.

4.title: Python for analytics and data science
4.description: Data science and machine learning with Python. I learned about data analysis, data visualization and machine learning. As well as the Python libraries Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib and Seaborn. Also machine learning with Scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

5.title: Data Scientist Training: The complete course
5.description: I've acquired a solid foundation in several areas of Data Science, from predictive modeling with Deep Learning to database techniques and cloud computing. This also includes important fundamentals of statistics, Python, R, SQL, and NoSQL, as well as good practices in data visualization.

6.title: Data Scientist Training: Advanced Topics
6.description: I learned advanced topics in Data Science, covering important areas such as Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI), modeling and evaluation techniques, as well as methods for dealing with unbalanced data sets and multi-label classification.

footer.heading: 2024 Dionmax. All rights reserved.
footer.description: built with React, Next.js (App Router & Server Actions), Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React Email & Resend and TypeScript.
